thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Evo Payments Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $100 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Evo Payments Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $100 Million
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Evo Payments Inc :
* EVO PAYMENTS INC FILES FOR IPO OF UP TO $100 MILLION – SEC FILING
* EVO PAYMENTS INC SAYS IT INTENDS TO APPLY TO HAVE ITS COMMON STOCK LISTED ON NASDAQ UNDER THE SYMBOL “EVOP”
* EVO PAYMENTS INC SAYS J.P. MORGAN, BOFA MERRILL LYNCH, CITIGROUP ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO
* EVO PAYMENTS INC SAYS DEUTSCHE BANK SECURITIES, SUNTRUST ROBINSON HUMPHREY, BARCLAYS ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO
* EVO PAYMENTS INC SAYS COWEN AND COMPANY, GOLDMAN SACHS & CO. LLC, REGIONS SECURITIES LLC ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO
* EVO PAYMENTS INC SAYS WILLIAM BLAIR IS AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO
* EVO PAYMENTS INC SAYS PROPOSED IPO PRICE IS AN ESTIMATE SOLELY FOR CALCULATING SEC REGISTRATION FEE Source text : ( bit.ly/2KgSQDR )
